item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Some of its magic, some its tragic, but I've had a good life along the way." -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "If we weren't all crazy, we'd just go insane. " -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Searching is half the fun: life is much more manageable when thought of as a scavenger hunt as opposed to a surprise party. " -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Jimmy Buffett
item.description: "Wrinkles will only go where the smiles have been. " -- Jimmy Buffett

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Dwight D. Eisenhower
item.description: "Leadership is the art of getting someone else to do something you want done because he wants to do it." -- Dwight D. Eisenhower

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Flavia
item.description: "Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same." -- Flavia

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Martin Luther King Jr.
item.description: "The quality, not the longevity, of one's life is what is important." -- Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "No one can make you feel inferior without your consent." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "Folks are usually about as happy as they make their minds up to be." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The best way to cheer yourself is to try to cheer someone else up." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "The secret of health for both mind and body is not to mourn for the past, nor to worry about the future, but to live the present moment wisely and earnestly." -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Every time you smile at someone, it is an action of love, a gift to that person, a beautiful thing." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Abraham Lincoln
item.description: "It has been my experience that folks who have no vices have very few virtues." -- Abraham Lincoln

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Spread the love of God through your life but only use words when necessary." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Amy M. add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "Do one thing every day that scares you." -- Eleanor Roosevelt
